attributes.action: veto Iceland's application to join the EU unless it refunds all money owed to the UK and the Netherlands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Iceland must repay the £2.3bn owed to British taxpayers which was loaned to the country by HMG following the failure of its banking system. Until the loan is repaid, the UK and Dutch governments must veto Iceland's application to join the EU.
